post.author: 박철우
post.content:
Programmer Analyst – Web Development and Intranet
As a result of planned expansion and international growth, we are currently looking for a person to join and grow with our MIS team. We are looking for a versatile Developer to work on various software development projects for both our Intranet and Website. Responsibilities will include:
•Requirements gathering, analysis, design, documentation •Development and testing
Qualifications for this position include a post secondary diploma or degree in Business Information Systems or Computer Programming with 3-4 years experience.
The successful candidate will also possess the following skills/experience:
•Visual Basic .Net and/or ASP .Net •Advanced SQL •Relational database design and data modeling •Web-based design and development •Ability to work under time constraints •Excellent attention to detail •Familiarity with Accpac (or other Accounting package)
If you want to join a growing and dynamic company, offering competitive salary and benefits, please submit your resume in confidence to www.startech.com:
post.title: .Net Developer (London, ON)
